item.title: Putting new items in a shop
item.dc:creator: @Ziege_Terra_117 Ziege Terra 117
item.description:
@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

Your not supposed to have that closing bracket on the last line of your wanneshop code… only at the beginning for the first line. If you get 100 errors, then that is the problem.

Read full topic
item.source: Putting new items in a shop

item.title: Putting new items in a shop
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Example:

} else if (NPCID == 549) { //Random shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 3; } else if (NPCID == 520) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 30; }

That’s how it’s done.

Read full topic

item.description:
@boxman222 wrote:

ok i have jaywalker shop maker. i want to put in godswords. and when i generate everything. i get this

[Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 520) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}

[Add in shops.cfg]
30 1 1 15366 5000000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
520 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 1
ok i find wanneshop thing i post under there compile and i get errors. i do same thing for shops. errors. and autospawn. errors. can anyone help meh??

Read full topic
